TechInnovators2025.name: Tech Innovators 2025
rules: Teams must consist of 2-4 members.
Participants must bring their own laptops.
Use of internet is allowed only for reference.
Plagiarism will lead to disqualification.
Judges' decisions are final.
Submissions must be completed before the deadline.
Respect other teams and maintain decorum.
Follow all event guidelines strictly.

CodeQuest2025.name: Code Quest 2025
rules: Individual or team participation (Max 3 members).
Coding must be done in allowed languages (Python, C++, Java, JavaScript).
Use of AI tools is strictly prohibited.
Internet access is allowed only for documentation.
Any form of cheating will lead to disqualification.
Judges' decisions are final.
Code must be submitted within the given time.
Respect fellow participants and follow event guidelines.

Tech2025.name: Tech Innovators 2025
rules: Teams must consist of 2-4 members.
Participants must bring their own laptops.
Use of internet is allowed only for reference.
Plagiarism will lead to disqualification.
Judges' decisions are final.
Submissions must be completed before the deadline.
Respect other teams and maintain decorum.
Follow all event guidelines strictly.

HackTheFuture2025.name: Hack The Future 2025
rules: Teams must consist of 3-5 members.
Each team must present an innovative solution using tech.
Use of open-source tools is encouraged.
No plagiarism is allowed.
Judging criteria: Innovation, feasibility, and presentation.
Final submissions must be made within the deadline.

Hack2025.name: Hack The Future 2025
rules: Teams must consist of 3-5 members.
Each team must present an innovative solution using tech.
Use of open-source tools is encouraged.
No plagiarism is allowed.
Judging criteria: Innovation, feasibility, and presentation.
Final submissions must be made within the deadline.

ArtFusion2025.name: Art Fusion 2025
rules: Participants must bring their own art supplies.
Theme will be announced on the spot.
Time limit: 2 hours.
Use of AI-generated art is not allowed.
Judges' decisions are final.

DebateBattle2025.name: Debate Battle 2025
rules: Teams of 2 members each.
Topics will be given 30 minutes before the debate.
Time limit per round: 5 minutes.
Use of offensive language will lead to disqualification.
Judges' decision is final.

TreasureHunt2025.name: Treasure Hunt 2025
rules: Teams of 4 members.
Each clue leads to the next location.
No use of mobile phones or internet for help.
Time limit: 2 hours.
Winning team must find all clues and reach the final destination first.

Debate025.name: Debate Battle 2025
rules: Teams of 2 members each.
Topics will be given 30 minutes before the debate.
Time limit per round: 5 minutes.
Use of offensive language will lead to disqualification.
Judges' decision is final.
